alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:03AM CDT until June 13 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lamar County in north central Texas... Northeastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 702 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albany, or 14 miles north of Bonham, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Honey Grove, Roxton, Sumner, Crockett Lake, Coffee Mill Lake, Forest Hill, Toco, Telephone, Duplex, Direct, Sowells Bluff, Petty, Globe, Brookston, Lamasco, Elwood, East Direct, Monkstown, Noble and Garretts Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
